pageContext.claim: “We discussed Hong Kong. And I think great progress has been made by China in Hong Kong. And I've been watching. And I actually told the Vice Premier it really has toned down a lot from the initial days of a number of months ago, when I saw a lot of people. And I see far fewer now. … It really has deescalated a lot from the beginning.”
pageContext.analysis: The Hong Kong protests had not deescalated when Trump made these remarks, with hundreds of thousands of demonstrators still taking to the streets.
